title: RockStar VA 270
subtitle: The most ambitious race ever conceived.
description: An absolutely insane, marvelous, and memorable experience. The innagural year of the RockStar VA, a 270 mile race from Harrisonburg to Roanoke, Virginia. Facing snow in the first week of April wasn't part of the plan.Many bailed prior to the race, I was one of the only ones to bail during the race.
author: cole
keywords: roanoke, harrisonburg, race, ride, endurance, virginia endurance series, bikepacking, gravel, trail, road, pave, snow, ultra
